channel.title: Client Icon Download Help
channel.description:
[b]i created a icon on the client when you download the .jar i had to change the .jar to .bat so i could change the icon then shortcut it. i downloaded a iconfx to create a icon image for my client now changed the icon and it looks amazing :)
only 1 problem when uploading to dropbox and players downloading the icon is removed because i guess its not on there computer like mine. how can i make it so they have the icon on there computer like pkhonor have
pkhonor have made it go into the documents... could someone help me skype:haviland41[/b]

item.title: Client Icon Download Help
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

make it that it downloads with the cache
and then make the place of the icon changed to icon in the cache path

Read full topic
